title: Loading late into Champion select.
body: Hi i would just like to ask if anybody has any ideas on why i might be loading in late to the champion select. It's really bugging me since i play mostly normal games so if I load late i usually don't get my preferred role, so if anyone has any ideas pls help <3{{champion:45}}

replies.body: Im having the same problem... Is it because of the internet connection or just because of a bug... Please help riot thanks{{champion:157}}
